It can be difficult to tell the two disorders apart in early childhood. However, the features of the two disorders differ later in life.",GHR,multiple lentigines syndrome
How many people are affected by multiple lentigines syndrome ?,Multiple lentigines syndrome is thought to be a rare condition; approximately 200 cases
